Package cat.nyaa.nyaacore.database.relational

Interface RelationalDB

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Cloneable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseDatabase, MysqlDatabase, SQLiteDatabase
    public interface RelationalDB
extends java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Every relational database has a default connection which will be connected and closed automatically

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default void beginTransaction()
      Begin a transaction on default connection
      void close()  
      default void commitTransaction()
      Commit current transaction on default connection
      void createTable​(java.lang.Class<?> cls)
      forcefully create a table in the database
      default void deleteTable​(java.lang.Class<?> cls)
      Deprecated.
      Unfinished API, subjects to changes

      get the "default" connection
      java.sql.Connection newConnection()
      Create a new connection, or get one from the pool depending the implementation

      Create a query that works directly on the default connection.

      Create a transactional query, possibly on a new connection

        Returns:
        the new connection

      • recycleConnection

        void recycleConnection​(java.sql.Connection conn)
        Close the connection or put it back into pool.
        Parameters:
        conn - the connection

      • query

        <T> Query<T> query​(java.lang.Class<T> tableClass)
        Create a query that works directly on the default connection. New table may be created using the default connection.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the table to be worked on
        Parameters:
        tableClass - the table class type
        Returns:
        the query

      • queryTransactional

        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:
        tableClass - the table class type
        Returns:
        the query
